required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long Term Follow-up Study on Safety and Maintenance of Efficacy of ATX-101
clinical_study.official_title: Long-term Follow-up Study of Subjects Who Completed Kythera-sponsored Trials of ATX-101 (Sodium Deoxycholate Injection) for the Reduction of Localized Subcutaneous Fat in the Submental Area

brief_summary.textblock: This was a long-term follow-up study of participants who completed Kythera-sponsored trials of ATX-101 (06-03, 07-07, 09-15)

detailed_description.textblock: No study medication was administered in this study.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Maintaining CR-SMFRS 1-Grade Response During 5 Years of Follow up, i.e. % of Participants Who Were CR-SMFRS 1-Grade Responders at Both Long-term LTFU Baseline and at Subsequent LTFU Visits
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 60 months from long-term follow-up (LTFU) baseline (the last visit in the previous study)
primary_outcome.description: The investigator evaluated the participant's chin and neck area using the Clinician-Reported Submental Fat Rating Scale (a 5-point scale) where: 0=absent submental convexity (best) to 4= extreme submental convexity (worst). Non-responders at LTFU baseline in each treatment group (including placebo) were not included in the analysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Maintaining PR-SMFRS 1-Grade Response During 5 Years of Follow up, i.e. % of Participants Who Were PR-SMFRS 1-Grade Responders at Both Long-term LTFU Baseline and at Subsequent LTFU Visits
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 60 months from long-term follow-up (LTFU) baseline (the last visit in the previous study)
primary_outcome.description: The participant evaluated their chin and neck area using the Patient-Reported Submental Fat Rating Scale (a 5-point scale) where: 0=no chin fat at all (best) to 4= a very large amount of chin fat (worst). Non-responders at LTFU baseline in each treatment group (including placebo) were not included in the analysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Maintaining Composite SMFRS 1-Grade Response During 5 Years of Follow up, i.e. % of Participants Who Were CR-SMFRS and PR-SMFRS 1-Grade Responders at Both Long-term LTFU Baseline and at Subsequent LTFU Visits
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 60 months from long-term follow-up (LTFU) baseline (the last visit in the previous study)
primary_outcome.description: The investigator evaluated the participant's chin and neck area using the Clinician-Reported Submental Fat Rating Scale (a 5-point scale) where: 0=absent submental convexity (best) to 4= extreme submental convexity (worst). The participant evaluated their chin and neck area using the Patient-Reported Submental Fat Rating Scale (a 5-point scale) where: 0=no chin fat at all (best) to 4= a very large amount of chin fat (worst). Non-responders at LTFU baseline in each treatment group (including placebo) were not included in the analysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Maintaining Composite SMFRS 2-Grade Response During 5 Years of Follow up, i.e. % of Participants Who Were CR-SMFRS and PR-SMFRS 2-Grade Responders at Both Long-term LTFU Baseline and at Subsequent LTFU Visits
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 60 months from long-term follow-up (LTFU) baseline (the last visit in the previous study)
primary_outcome.description: The investigator evaluated the participant's chin and neck area using the Clinician-Reported Submental Fat Rating Scale (a 5-point scale) where: 0=absent submental convexity (best) to 4= extreme submental convexity (worst). The participant evaluated their chin and neck area using the Patient-Reported Submental Fat Rating Scale (a 5-point scale) where: 0=no chin fat at all (best) to 4= a very large amount of chin fat (worst). Non-responders at LTFU baseline in each treatment group (including placebo) were not included in the analysis.

arm_group.description: Participants treated with placebo in previous ATX-101 studies
Participants treated with ATX-101 (1 mg/cm^2) in previous phase 2 studies
Participants treated with ATX-101 (2 mg/cm^2) in previous phase 2 studies
Participants treated with ATX-101 (4 mg/cm^2) in previous phase 2 studies

intervention.description: Clinical evaluation, patient reported outcome questionnaires, photographs, caliper measurements and recording adverse events
Clinical evaluation, patient reported outcome questionnaires, photographs, caliper measurements and recording adverse events
Clinical evaluation, patient reported outcome questionnaires, photographs, caliper measurements and recording adverse events
Clinical evaluation, patient reported outcome questionnaires, photographs, caliper measurements and recording adverse events

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Any subject who successfully completed a Kythera-sponsored clinical trial of ATX-101 (06-03, 07-07, 09-15)
- Signed informed consent
- Willingness to comply with schedule and procedures of the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who have had or are undergoing treatment that may affect the evaluation of the submental area will be excluded

facility.name: Dermatology Institute of DuPage Medical Group in Naperville

participant_flow.recruitment_details: The objective of this non-treatment, placebo-controlled, 5-year follow-up study was to evaluate the long-term efficacy and safety of subcutaneous (SC) injections of deoxycholic acid (ATX-101) in the submental area. No treatment was administered in this study.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Participants who previously received deoxycholic acid or placebo injections in studies ATX-101-06-03, ATX-101-07-07, & ATX-101-09-15 were enrolled in this non-treatment follow-up study to further evaluate safety and efficacy.

group.title: ATX-101 (Deoxycholic Acid) Injection
group.description: This is a non-treatment follow-up study. Participants were previously treated with deoxycholic acid injection, 10 mg/mL in 1 of 3 predecessor studies ATX-101-06-03, ATX-101-07-07, and ATX-101-09-15

group.title: Placebo
group.description: This is a non-treatment follow-up study. Participants were previously treated with placebo in 1 of 3 predecessor studies ATX-101-06-03, ATX-101-07-07, and ATX-101-09-15

measure.title: Age
measure.description: Age at Visit 0 (Day 0); date of last visit in the predecessor study to which a participant was originally enrolled.

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants Maintaining CR-SMFRS 1-Grade Response During 5 Years of Follow up, i.e. % of Participants Who Were CR-SMFRS 1-Grade Responders at Both Long-term LTFU Baseline and at Subsequent LTFU Visits
outcome.description: The investigator evaluated the participant's chin and neck area using the Clinician-Reported Submental Fat Rating Scale (a 5-point scale) where: 0=absent submental convexity (best) to 4= extreme submental convexity (worst). Non-responders at LTFU baseline in each treatment group (including placebo) were not included in the analysis.
outcome.time_frame: Up to 60 months from long-term follow-up (LTFU) baseline (the last visit in the previous study)
outcome.population: Analysis population included all who received study treatment from a previous study, and who were CR-SMFRS 1-Grade Responders at LTFU Baseline

reported_events.time_frame: Up to 60 months from the last visit in the previous study
reported_events.desc: All enrolled participants with a clearly identifiable actual treatment received from a previous ATX-101 study and at least 1 visit in the long-term follow-up (LTFU) study were included in the analysis population. All adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs) that were ongoing at the conclusion of the predecessor Studies ATX-101-06-03, ATX-101-07-07, and ATX-101-09-15, were followed until they resolved or were considered medically stable.

group.title: ATX-101 (Deoxycholic Acid) Injection
group.description: This is a non-treatment follow-up study. Participants were previously treated with deoxycholic acid injection, 10 mg/mL in 1 of 3 predecessor studies ATX-101-06-03, ATX-101-07-07, and ATX-101-09-15

group.title: Placebo

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: A disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 90 days from the time submitted to the sponsor for review. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
